andersen.name: Andersen "Andy" Sturner
andersen.bio: Andersen Sturner (who goes by Andy) is a Junior at Ardrey Kell High School in Charlotte, NC and the mastermind behind the idea of P.H.A.T. Tags.  He has loved animals for his entire life and has always thought of ways to improve animals' lives. His passions include finding creative ways to solve problems. creating things and he enjoys spending time with friends, playing video games, and sometimes reading.
